## Machine Information
- **Brand:** 
- **Model:** 
- **Type:** (Dual Boiler / Single Boiler / Heat Exchanger / Thermoblock)

## Machine Specifications

### Boilers
- **Brew Boiler Capacity:** (e.g., 0.75L)
- **Steam Boiler Capacity:** (e.g., 2L)
- **Heater Power (Brew):** (e.g., 1500W)
- **Heater Power (Steam):** (e.g., 1000W)

### Sensors (stock)
- [ ] Brew temperature sensor (type: NTC/thermocouple/thermostat)
- [ ] Steam temperature sensor (type: NTC/thermocouple/thermostat)
- [ ] Pressure sensor/gauge
- [ ] Water level probe (steam boiler)
- [ ] Water tank level sensor
- [ ] Flow meter

### Existing Controller
- **Controller Model:** 
- **Photo of controller board:** (if available)
- **Is schematic available?** 

## Wiring Information
Do you have access to:
- [ ] Wiring diagram from manufacturer
- [ ] Photos of internal wiring
- [ ] Ability to trace wiring

## Your Goals
What do you want to achieve with BrewOS on this machine?
- [ ] Basic PID temperature control
- [ ] Full feature set (WiFi, OTA, etc.)
- [ ] Just monitoring (no control modifications)

## Your Contribution
- [ ] I have this machine and can test
- [ ] I can provide detailed photos and measurements
- [ ] I can help with documentation
- [ ] I can contribute code/schematics

## Additional Information
Any other relevant details about this machine.
